I went for 4Geeks' Full-stack developer bootcamp to prepare myself for a change of career into the world  of coding. Thanks to the preparation during the course and the job support after its completion, I can now say I have achieved just that

4Geeks Academy presents a very well-designed FullStack bootcamp, in my opinion. It provides a fair amount of knowledge in several technologies that are heavily demanded in the market nowadays. It equips you with the proper tools to navigate the course with ease, allowing you to focus on what is important: learning. BUT, this is not a miraculous solution; it all depends on your dedication and time. You still need to learn A LOT on your own if you want to succeed quickly (I've been working on my programming skills almost like a full-time job since I started the bootcamp, and it took me 6 months after finishing it to land a job). Don't get me wrong: this is the same for every bootcamp. It's impossible to reach a professional level in programming in just 3 months by only attending classes. That being said, if you think you have the time and the strength, 4Geeks is just an amazing academy. Not only do they teach you the skills, but they also teach you how to keep learning. Also, I probably wouldn't have had this job opportunity if it weren't for the amazing career support they provide after the course. Now I know how to navigate this world, and that's just as valuable as the skills themselves.

I absolutely recommend you to check what they have to offer!Less

En mi opinión, la experiencia no fue del todo satisfactoria. El curso se desarrolla en un período de tres meses, lo cual resulta en un aprendizaje muy acelerado. Los instructores, al revisar las tareas de cada módulo, no se aseguran de que los proyectos sigan buenas prácticas; simplemente, si el proyecto funciona, se considera aprobado, lo cual considero inapropiado. Además, quedan muchos vacíos en la lógica de programación, especialmente en el backend. Para aquellos que deseen especializarse como programadores backend, el contenido del bootcamp es insuficiente, ya que cubre solo aspectos muy básicos. Un punto a favor es la calidad de los instructores, quienes son competentes; sin embargo, la brevedad del curso impide que se profundice adecuadamente en cada tema.Less

I couldn't be happier with my choice. I conducted research before choosing 4Geeks Academy, and most of the competitors charge approximately 400% more than 4Geeks, yet they don't offer anything that 4Geeks doesn't provide.

I absolutely loved the Full-stack program; it truly delivers what they promise. The program is 100% practical and equips you with all the skills and knowledge required for a real-world software engineering job.

The instructors and mentors are incredibly kind and helpful. 4Geeks requests student feedback on a monthly basis, but more importantly, they take action based on the provided feedback, which is really rare to see in most organizations out there.

This is an excellent Bootcamp to become a full-stack developer from zero knowledge. They are really involved and worried about the success of their students. Career support and mentorship are great  to improve, learn or / and resolve.

I started the course in April and currently I am in the final phase, working with my team on the final project. It has been a roller coaster of emotions and feelings, but I would definitely do it again. 
Throughout the course we got support from both our teacher and the teacher assistant. You can ask for mentorship sessions to build up on certain things or, in case you did not understand something, to review. It is very important that you ask questions. Revise, read everything there is to read and attend those sessions. You can't just attend the classes and call it a day. You need to program outside of the scheduled classes as well and the more you do, the better for you. Every module has at least one project, which has several levels and you can add more functionalities. I always tried to personalize things to make them more interesting. Sky really is the limit! 
At the beginning things look very overwhelming and scary, but once you notice the pattern and you reflect upon your progress, you realize that it works. You just need to have faith in the course and the way things are done. Talk to your classmates, to your teachers. Don't believe what that little voice in your head is telling you. Everybody struggles, some people are doing the exercises faster, some people are slower. Some are better in one module, but completely suck at the other one. Just keep on coding, it will get easier after some time.
What I do definitely recommend is to reduce working hours when working on the final project. If you can, even take a vacation. Don't underestimate the task, you will need to code every single day and you most probably will face some technical issues which will require time.Less

It was quite scary at the beginning since I had absolutely no experience in programming. The student needs to have time and focus, and the school provide a good schedule to follow. The pre course is very important for those who, just like me, didn't have any experience when they landed in the school. Special thanks to Javier who gave me an extra support and a boost when I needed, such a great professional!

I have had an incredible experience at the Academy, I am very happy with the process that I ended with 4Geeks, I learned a lot.
It is a completely different course from those taught by other institutions; I don't change it; They don't leave you alone in learning.

It has been a very intense experience, since there is a lot to learn and little time but that is what bootcamps are all about. In addition, everything is easier thanks to the teachers, willing to help you with everything whenever you need it.

I would definitely repeat!

They gave us lots of exercises to practice and projects to work on our time pretty much after each class. They offer unlimited mentorships which came along way throughout the entire course. I became somewhat lost, when I Started learning backend because it was a lot of information in a short time, but it was expected, after all, it's a 16 week bootcamp.
The teachers, mentors and TA's were very helpful at all times. I recommend joining this bootcamp if you are looking for something completely online and part-timeLess

4geeks bootcamp was intense! It was 18+ weeks of complete immersion into the world of programing. I loved the hands-on approach they provided; for almost every class we had homework to do and it kept us focused on the task at hand. There were times the course got a bit overwhelming, but that's only natural when there's so much to learn in a short period of time. One of the best features of this bootcamp are the mentorships. There is always someone available to help, not to mention the whole 4geeks community who is very active on slack. During the course, Javier Seiglie and Bruno Marques helped me a lot with their mentorships, which made the whole experience a lot lighter.
If I could go back in time, I still would have chosen this bootcamp to get me started in the field.Less

Como estudiante del bootcamp de Full Stack Developer en 4Geeks, no puedo más que expresar mi gratitud y satisfacción por la experiencia. Unirme a este programa fue una decisión arriesgada -porque te cambia la vida- que no me arrepiento de haber tomado.
El ritmo de las clases y de los proyectos está muy bien organizado y pensado para que aprendas progresivamente, con la cantidad de 'estrés' necesario para avanzar y sentirte desafiada, sin caer en la frustración que impide seguir adelante. 
Hay 10 horas de clases semanales y le dediqué el mismo tiempo o más fuera de clases para poder cumplir con los proyectos que se exigen en cada etapa. 
La dinámica de la clase también es muy interesante porque es esencialmente práctico y vas rotando con distintos compañeros para aprender en equipo y apoyarte en el conocimiento de los demás. 
El último mes te embarcas en la elaboración de un proyecto final que lleva muchísima dedicación y vas afianzando los contenidos, en equipo y con mucho apoyo y orientación de profesores y mentores.Less

Mi decisión en unirme al bootcamp de 4Geeks Academy para ser un Full Stack Developer ha sido una de las mejores decisiones que he tomado. Mi nombre es Miguel y tengo 18 años. 
Todo empezó en mi escuela, donde había visto bases de programación muy básicas y me había llamado la atención, sin embargo no le hice mucho caso al tema. Cuando me gradué de mi colegio en noviembre (2022), iba a tener casi medio año de inactividad debido a que mi carrera universitaria la voy a estudiar en Madrid, España y empieza en septiembre (2023). 

Cuando supe que tendría medio año libre antes de comenzar mis estudios en Madrid, me vi enfrentado a una oportunidad de invertir en mí mismo y enfatizar la programación en mi vida. Después de haber investigado en internet diferentes bootcamps, encontré a 4Geeks Academy, la academia que ofrece un bootcamp para ser Full Stack Developer, el cual me brindaba la oportunidad de desarrollar conocimientos en el area de programación y el desarrollo de aplicaciones web.
Desde el primer día en el bootcamp supe que había tomado la decisión correcta. Me di cuenta de que la programación era otra cosa en mi vida que en realidad me apasionaba hacer. Gracias a la metodología y los recursos que brindan, me motivaron muchísimo a aprender y desarrollar mis habilidades a profundidad.
El apoyo que te brinda 4Geeks tanto mis profesores Oscar Miras y Sergio Araujo, como Victor Gómez, Marco Gómez y Ehiber Graterol es esencial, siempre están dispuestos a cualquier cosa que necesites y que la motivación y las ganas de aprender no se vayan nunca.
El bootcamp me ofreció mucho más que aprender a programar, me permitió entrar en un entorno donde el trabajo en equipo y la colaboración es fundamental. Aprendí a comunicarme, compartir ideas y trabajar en proyectos con mis compañeros de clase.
Unirme al bootcamp fue algo que influeció mucho mi vida y me hizo dar cuenta de que la programación y la tecnología es una pasión que no había tenido mucho en cuenta. 
Gracias a la academia y al bootcamp, tuve la oportunidad de tener una visión más clara  sobre lo que quería estudiar en la universidad y llevar a cabo a lo largo de mi vida, por lo que finalmente decidí estudiar Ingeniería Informática.Less

The title speaks for itself. At 4Geeks Academy Spain I found a new family. A family that has, is and will continue to help me and my cohorts on this journey in search of a new beginning in personal and professional life. It's been a fantastic journey, since prework, walking alongside fantastic mentors and students, always ready to help each other, to progress and continue in this vast world that is the programming. Our motto: "Never stop programming".

This course is great if you want to get started into programming as we start from the very basics and we start to go up in every class. You will learn how to think like a programmer and solve simple challenges and then you will able to create small projects that will use all the abilities that you learn throughout all the course.
4geeks gives the best support during the course. It has top-level professionals teaching you. The teaching material is impeccable.
La experiencia no ha sido del todo mala, pero dejan mucho en el camino, 3 meses de finalizado el bootcamp y no conseguis trabajo, muchas horas de dedicación y luego estás muy solo.

There is a lot of bootcamps around, but not all of them have the attention to detail and the continuous support 4Geeks offers to every student. From the day to day exercises made to teach you everything you need with no required previous knowledge, to the mentorships at any time, as many times as you need to complete your projects now and in the future. And then, when everything is done and others could forget about you, you get support to improve your CV, tips to find a job, suggested offers and more.

I certainly didn't expected so much when I started.Less

En lo personal tuve una excelente experiencia de principio a fin.
Los tutoriales son muy buenos, el material es muy interactivo y facil de digerir.
Yo venia con 0 conocimiento de programacion y pude terminar sin problema el curriculo y empezar a desarrollar web apps.
Recibi muy buena atencion del equipo y los maestros excelentes. 
Resuelven tus dudas y te ayudan cuando necesitas.
los profesores tienen la mejor disposicion para resolver tus dudas y aparte siempre hay mentorias gratuitas cuando tienes un trabajo fuera de clase que te quedas estancado.

I really recommend this course to anyone who wants to get started in the world of programming, especially to those who have 0 previous knowledge in the subject.
The selection of technologies, the very good teachers that the program has and the organization of the topics in terms of complexity and learning curve, are very well balanced.
Being a student of the Full-Time mode, I can say that it requires absolute willingness and exclusive dedication during the entire training time, there is no other way, it is necessary to make the sacrifice, but the result is unobjectionable, one really acquires the basic skills necessary to develop at the end of the course a complete basic Full-Stack project, which indicates a first big step towards the goal of becoming a professional developer.
Overall, 4Geeks delivers what it promises, giving you the initial basic tools to become a Full-Stack programmer, but here is a caveat, once you finish the training program, you have to continue studying, learning new technologies and making projects, but this will happen in any other bootcamp or even once you graduate from an IT university career.
What big technologies you will learn?
Backend: Basic Flask/Python, FrontEnd: Basic React with Hooks(No useReducer, no Redux)/Bootstrap 5, FullStack Deployment with RenderLess

I confess that my first thought was that this was for scientists, young people, that it was something very difficult. Typical of a woman who did not develop Steam thinking from her childhood.
I was encouraged to sign up and take advantage of the possibility of training and having better tools to direct Machine Learning projects.
It was a huge challenge, I needed to focus, dedicate hours, read, practice, ask questions, but today I am enjoying the result.
The applied STEAM educational model is one of the best models I have experienced.
We were protagonists of our own learning in a collaborative environment between teachers and students, learning by doing, strengthening creativity, critical thinking and exercising analytical and innovative behaviors. We practice logical, curious and I could say suspicious thinking. We lost the fear of being wrong. We learned to work as a team and make decisions together or how to present a job professionally.
We were protagonists of our own learning in a collaborative environment between teachers and students, learning by doing, strengthening creativity, critical thinking and exercising analytical and innovative behaviors. Today I feel that a new door has opened, the world of data awaits me and I am going towards it. I finally found what I was looking for, an opportunity to reinvent myself.

For the past 16 weeks, I have been learning how to completely develop a web application at 4Geeks, and I have really enjoyed it.

In the first weeks of the course, we covered the basics of front-end development (html, css, javascript, and react), as well as complementary technologies required for working in an office environment (git, command line, etc).

Subsequently, the training focused on interacting with APIs, before creating one with SQLAlchemy, Python, and Flask. As well, we learned how to limit access to the API information.

The last part of the course was a four-week final project that consisted of building a complete web application that put all the knowledge learned in the course to the test through a stream on the academy's YouTube channel.

In each class, we had a teacher and an assistant who taught us the bases to carry out the exercises of the program meticulously. I have also benefited from unlimited mentoring provided by the school, which helped me to strengthen my knowledge and resolve any doubts I had throughout the bootcamp.

In my opinion, the most valuable aspect of the academy is that all the teachers and mentors have been very willing to thoroughly teach me the content and to ensure that I understand the technologies. It's an atmosphere that's focused on total collaboration and helping you learn as much as possible (even remotely).

4Geeks is a great place to learn how to program, and with dedication on your part, you will surely learn a great deal about programming.Less

Muchos son los valientes que se embarcan en el heroico camino del aprendizaje del desarrollo de software desde las profundidades del desconocimiento, virando su destino de la aburrida vida ordinaria al maravilloso mundo del desarrollo... y terminan perdidos, sin los conocimientos o las habilidades necesarias para aprovechar las herramientas a su disposición.

Bueno, pues eso no les hubiera ocurrido de haber estudiado en 4Geeks Academy. Con un currículum bien pensado, focalizado en enseñar de manera eficiente y rápida, pero con la profundidad necesaria las herramientas más demandadas en la actualidad, en 16 intensas semanas de aprendizaje estarás preparado para dar tus primeros pasos en este mundo entrando con buen pie. 

En este momento, si bien está sujeto a cambios para mantenerse siempre a la vanguardia del mercado, se enseña JavaScript con React para el desarrollo Frontend y Python con Flask para el desarrollo Backend, además de otras herramientas y conocimientos básicos, siendo estas tecnologías unas de las más demandadas (si no las más) en el actual mercado laboral del desarrollo.

Si bien el curso es intenso y exigente, 4Geeks Academy ofrece mucho más de lo que demanda y, sin duda, puede ser el punto de inflexión perfecto en la vida de muchas personas que, como yo, opten por dar un giro radical a su vida haciendo un cambio de carrera y accediendo a uno de los mercados más grandes (y con mejores sueldos) en la actualidad.

Además de esto, cabe destacar que, no solo cuentan con profesores y mentores muy bien preparados, si no que ofrecen apoyo para la búsqueda de empleo (incluyendo preparación para las temidas entrevistas técnicas) y un sistema de mentorías vitalicio, con lo que siempre podrás contar con el apoyo de la academia, incluso tiempo después de haber concluido la formación básica en ella.Less
It is an add value lifetime mentorships and access to the platform
Bootcamp 100% recomendado. Los profesores son grandes profesionales del sector.

The course is very complete, and the way they teach is very smooth, I can’t believe the apps that I am doing now that I graduated. I love the course and I hope to be back in the academy again for more knowledge, teacher and mentors are very patient and friendly.
Tienen una gran metodología de aprendizaje que te ayuda a coger gran nivel de programación.

It was a very good experience, the teachers were amazing, they were always ready to help us no matter when or how, and the academy really cares about how we feel and communicated with us a lot providing us career support and creating a big community between students.

Después de haber terminado el bootcamp de Full Stack Developer, puedo decir que estoy totalmente satisfecho de haberme decidido a hacerlo. Clases amenas, profesores competentes y organización enfocada a poder aprender mucho en poco tiempo. Eso sí, debes estar dispuest@ a dedicarle muchas horas de estudio y tomartelo muy en serio si quieres aprovecharlo al máximo.

Todo el curso está bastante bien planteado, desde el prework hasta la presentación del proyecto final. Me encanta la metodología utilizada, donde cada día tenemos que poner en práctica lo hemos visto en clase, de esta forma vamos consolidando todo lo vamos aprendiendo. Y además  siempre que tengamos alguna dificultad podemos recurrir a las mentorías y sacar todas nuestras dudas.
Es increíble lo que he podido aprender en tan poco tiempo.

The title perfectly describes my experience with this course and with everyone involved in this school. They go the extra mile to help you in whatever you need to finish your projects, exercises or to make you move forward in your career.
After doing this course, for sure, you can do your own app with all the intricacies.

I heard about this program from my brother who was currently halfway into it, at the time I had no experience whatsoever in coding and told him I would look into it but no promises. I looked at the curriculum spoke with advisors and decided that I was too scared to go forward with it. a year passed and I saw firsthand the success that my brother was getting from his newfound career and I decided to give it a try. at first it was extremely difficult. to the point that I wanted to give up and in a way I did, thankfully 4geeks has some of the best and most supportive staff and peers that I've ever experienced in my life, they spoke with me as a person and from my perspective and pushed me to continue even though I did not feel like I was good enough, between the day to day mentoring the 24/7 support chat the 1 to 1 mentoring that's sperate from the global mentoring and even being able to communicate with classmates and work problems out together, I was able to get back on my feet and catch up to where I needed to be, not once did they allow me to give up and assured me that this was all a learning process and eventually we all get it and here I am now confident and ready to start my new career that if asked a year ago I would have that it was impossible. honestly, the greatest investment I've made for the betterment of myself and I will recommend it to anyone and everyone who I can. thank you 4geeksLess

When i first heard about this from my brother who had graduated before me i was honestly very skeptical of the process, i wasn't sure if it was the right fit for me and the price was very high in my eyes at the time, in fact i had signed up done all the paperwork and then decided i couldn't take the risk. a year passed and i saw the success that my brother was having with his new career and decided it was time for me to stop procrastinating and try to improve my future, i signed up did the course and halfway in i felt overwhelmed , it was my first time every doing coding and it was so much information to memorize in such a short span of time that i felt like giving up thankfully this school has so many resources you can use between teachers, assistants, tutoring and almost daily mentoring sessions available to the public, and with all their help i was able to get to where i am now confident in the process and ready to start my journey into a new profession that if you had asked me a year ago would i be able to do it i would've told you im not smart enough or it seems to difficult. i tried so many free code camps and ill tell you now the complete support and understanding you get from your peers and teachers is an indispensable learning tool that you will regret missing out on. dont be scared and give it a try. i dLess
Great learning experience, plenty of support and communication. They gave me the tools and confidence to succeed in a new field that I've been passionate about.

I took this class in the Fall of 2021. As someone who always wanted to get into coding and into the tech field, 4Geeks Academy was really a great experience. I had a mild coding background with Python and JS. The program was intuitive and our instructor was extremely knowledgeable about everything. However, like almost all boot camps it's important to put in the time to get to learn the coding items. You get what you put into it. The environment is very much everyone working together, with lots of opportunities to pair programs as well as code as a group to learn the intricacies of what is going on. I made a lot of good connections within my cohort, and a worthwhile experience.Less
Amazing! You want to become a programmer and in the process learn how to actually code, this is the place.

4GeeksAcademy ha sido una experiencia increíble llena de aprendizaje y me voy feliz con un montón de conocimientos que hace 5 meses no tenia en absoluto. El equipo completo es muy profesional y muy humano, te acompañan en todo y siempre!

No sabía nada a cerca de programación hasta que llegué a 4Geeks y todo dió un giro de 180°, la atención, dedicación y calidez de los profesores es de otro mundo, siempre que necesites aclarar algo ellos siempre estarán para guiarte y aconsejarte, hacen que la experiencia sea más reconfortante, apesar de la presión constante para acumular conocimiento. Los proyectos y ejercicios son también algo lo cual va a otros niveles, algunos con una dificultad que pone a pensar y a buscarle las vueltas, pero todos claro con el objetivo de aprender a resolver y a intentar todo hasta que resulte como queremos, en mi opinión, 4Geeks es la mejor opción si quieres aprender a Programador desde 0 con profesores atentos y verdaderos retos que afrontar para ser mejores.Less

Llegue de cero en este mundo de la programación y debo decir que hacer este Bootcamp fue una decisión más que acertada, en 4Geeks Academy aprendí las bases de lo que necesita para ser un desarrollador Full Stack, la experiencia fue muy positiva desde el principio y todo el staff te hace sentir muy cercano y que perteneces a una gran comunidad. La calidad de los profesores es incuestionable, son muy pacientes y se encargan de enseñarte todo una y otra vez hasta que lo aprendes, por otra parte la metodología de aprendizaje y los proyectos a realizar son desafiantes pero muy entretenidos y te hacen aprender mucho (sobretodo el proyecto final). 
No les voy a mentir... Hay que dedicarle muchas horas e intentar estar siempre al dia para no quedarte atrás pero lo disfruté mucho y hasta se me hizo corto, si pudiera repetirlo lo haría sin dudarlo. En lo personal apenas al terminar pude conseguir mis primeras prácticas de las cuales sigo aprendiendo y gracias a las habilidades adquiridas estos últimos meses también voy a empezar a hacer mis primeros proyectos freelance. 
Si quieres ser un programador esta academia es el mejor sitio para empezar!.Less
Todo perfecto, durante el bootcamp y el soporte que te dan después, muy contento.

After several years away from the world of programming. Trying to catch up, there was so much technology that I didn't know where to start. Through an advertisement on the internet I found this academy. They gave me many facilities for financing and good expectations of getting a good job afterwards. Very practical training and with the necessary advice, even after finishing the bootcamp, to move forward without problems.

Un excelente equipo, con basta experiencia en programación, además acompaña al profesor una persona de apoyo que se nivela a ti y entiende mas de la mano tus dudas , como inexperto que somos en el área al iniciar. Su plan de estudio es completo y con un fuerte ahincó en el desarrollo practico que permite que quede claro todo.

Para mi una experiencia grata que me deja todo a favor para mi desarrollo profesional

It has been a great experience! Discover step by step the technologies that bring me closer to this new world so long awaited for me. They have been very patient with me, explaining and explaining again everything that I could not understand, with the maximum availability. It has been a real pleasure and I hope that now it will open the doors of the sector for me.
The best experience ever! All the teachers are great!

Formación de gran calidad y muy práctica. Te preparan para un mercado laboral cada vez más digitalizado ya que la información que imparten siempre está actualizada. Profesorado atento y profesional. Están atentos a tus necesidades y dudas y te apoyan en todo momento. Recomendable 100%!

This is a really good bootcamp, it is fast paced yet understandable. I had other coding courses and nothing compares to this one. It's not only a coding class, it gives a lot of tools to find a job, come soft skills training, and several workshops to learn other skills and abilities you will need in the IT world.
El proceso desde antes de empezar el bootcamp hasta el final fue un notorio ascenso en las habilidades tecnicas, en el entendimiento de problemas y el intentar resolverlos con tecnologia

Joining 4geeks has been a life changing experience. from the first time i reached out to them until now on the cusp of graduation the 4geeks team has gone above and beyond what i expected from them. 
My situation was very complicated as i lived on the other side of the world and had a 12 hour difference from the other students and teachers. Despite that setback the instructors and staff ahve always been available and friendly. 
The teachers are excellent and have a wealth of knowledge. apart from the curriculum my instructor sprinkled in his own nuggets of information when he had time. 
One of my favorite aspects of the course was the mentoring program (which is available even after graduation). Here there is a staff of teachers who are available to have 1- 1 meetings about pretty much anything you can think of related to programming/coding. 
The core curriculum is extensive and gives a solid background in several languages. looking back at where i was at the beginning of the course to now... the difference is night and day and i feel so much more confident when approaching new material now. 
There are also mini talks and presentations related to applying to jobs and different aspects of coding. 
Choosing to join 4geeks is one of the best decisions i have made in my life!Less
Everything was great. I studied like I never studied before like I did here and discovered my passion for programming. It is a fantastic  course to take with a lot of support

I really love the 4Geeks family, I have a great experience with them. The team is phenomenal. The mentorship program in my perspective is Top tier, whenever you have an issue or your are stuck somewhere with your code, best believe 4Geeks gotcha...

When I joined 4Geeks Academy I had the expectation to learn programming and become a full stack developer, I think they methodoly is very good, it push you to learn but also investigate and the instructors are great and the support during the entire bootcamp is really good, they are always willing to help.
I have experience in Java and I have learned a lot of knowledge last year in the bootcamp
The academy was amazing, instructors were helpful and readily available.

It was an amazing experience. I knew some basic stuff  before it started but thanks to the teachers and other students I learned a lot of new things. The exercises and the continued support from everyone really stood out and made it a great experience.
The experience was great. I met a lot of very interesting people, the teachers helped me a lot, the meets were enjoyable and the given topics were very interesting.
Acabe el bootcamp y realmente aprendi muchísimo, sales realmente preparado, con muchos conocimientos, Gracias por todo

I knew some of the basics before I started. But with the pre-work, coding exercises, classes, mentorships, and hard work I have improved drastically and have adopted new techniques that make me a way better programmer!
This is an excellent Bootcamp to become a full-stack developer from zero knowledge

I knew some of the basics before I started such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. But with the pre-work and the rest of the entire course I have drastically improved and have adopted new techniques that make me a way better programmer!
My time at the 4geeks bootcamp was amazing, the people, the teachers, and the CEO was incredible as a person and as a professional.

I'm taking the Full Stack Developer course full-time remotely. Even being a remote course, the feeling is close for the rest of the classmates and teachers. The demand for learning is steep and requires a lot of perseverance and commitment, but the mentoring system is amazing and makes the whole journey so much easier. The academy is very involved in helping you while you study and in giving you the tools for your professional career. With the support and follow-up of the teachers, as well as the unlimited mentoring service, in addition to personal effort, which is not little, I can assure you that you really learn to develop. The entire Bootcamp has a practical approach and you learn by programming with the most demanded languages and technologies at the moment: Javascript, Python, and React.Less

From the begining you know how it is going to be. They are very clear in terms of what you have to do and how to do it. The teachers were amazing, always trying to keep you focus on your tasks, helping you to reach your goals and guiding you to the next level. An amazing experience.

It was daunting as the amount of work is considerably high, but this translates into a lot of practice. Our instructor was very good, as well as the teacher assistant.
The curriculum is very complete and it goes fairly in-deep for the relatively short time the course lasts. Overall it was a fantastic experience and though there are still a lot of things to learn, I feel I have a solid base to continue on this path.

It was daunting as the amount of work is considerably high, but this translates into a lot of practice. Our instructor was very good, as well as the teacher assistant.
The curriculum is very complete and it goes fairly in-deep for the relatively short time the course lasts. Overall it was a fantastic experience and though there are still a lot of things to learn, I feel I have a solid base to continue on this path.

Te dan la oportunidad de aprender desde 0, muy pendientes de ti desde el primer momento, y la calidad de las clases se nota. Además, con su filosofía "learning by doing", ayuda mucho a solucionar los problemas por ti mismo y aprendiendo tanto de errores como de aciertos.
The classes are quite enjoyable. Just theory to quickly start working on the exercises in each module. The relationship with the teachers and classmates has been very good and pleasant.

The classes are quite entertaining, with the necessary theory to quickly start working on the exercises in each module. The relationship with the teachers and classmates has been very good and pleasant.

From the beginning, the experience was amazing. The instructors are knowledgable and make it a point to always be available to help, you have continuous tutoring sessions and you are always working. The pace of the course is rigorous, so it demands a lot of effort in order to keep it up but it echoes the broad knowledge you get once you are finished. 4Geeks is not an academy, is a community always there to help you.
It has been and fun and knowledgeable experience so far. Colby has been very invested in every ones  progress and sending us taking time from class to get projects started.
From Designer to Developer. After finishing the bootcamp just a few weeks later, I found an opportunity in the IT sector thanks to 4 geeks.
Super recommendable course for people without experience in the field of software development
Para ser honestos al inicio me sentia confundido, pero poco a poco agarre confianza dada por vuestros profesores, ademas de eso la experiencia super unica y de mucho crecimiento

Before you officially start the program, they give you pre-work that consists mainly HTML & CSS. I had exposure to HTML and CSS before starting the boot camp which did help me a little. So if you want to learn a little about HTML and CSS before starting the program it’s always helpful but not a necessity.

You’re going to learn a LOT. Don’t feel discouraged if you don’t feel ready enough in one area when the program progresses to another concept. The 4Geeks community is really helpful and kind, they’ll help you with anything. They have mentors you can schedule sessions with to help you with assignments or questions that you have. Everyone there wants you to succeed. Once you’re a part of the 4Geeks family, you’re there forever.

With any bootcamp or learning resource, it’s really about the time and energy you put into something. There are tons of exercises and projects that they have for you, as well as class instruction where you work on projects in class. Don't be shy to ask for help! They really do encourage you to schedule mentoring sessions and may even have "study group" sessions once a week with a TA to help with the current assignments you're working on. Take advantage of the resources available!

Unrelated to the boot camp, one advice I keep seeing and hearing is when you learn enough to build a simple project, build, build, build! You’ll have plenty to build within the program, but in general always keep building and using Google for what you know. I always think I understand something until I start building lol so applying your knowledge is key!Less

This bootcamp had all the technologies that are most valued in the industry right now. Even though there are a few more you may still need to fit some jobs. However, its good because we get pushed to figure out how to look up information on our own, to find answers or solidify concepts. 

In other words, I am glad I took a loan for this (this bootcamp is one of the most affordable one I found), because I was struggling to teach myself coding and feeling overwhelmed, with no one to really rely on for guidance or feedback. I also can see other students getting jobs and posting about jobs in our slack channels, overall this is a solid investment for those willing to put the work in.Less

My experience has been very good with 4Geeks. For me, the part that I thought was the best is the teachers concern for their students and willingness to help them, and the fact that they let you take the course again, no questions asked, if you feel you need to. That is exactly what I did, since the first time I went through the bootcamp I was working a lot and didn't feel like I was able to give it my all. Like any school or human, there were good parts and bad, but overall I think for the price and what you get, they did an excellent job. Some schools charge nearly double and end up teaching the same or less than 4Geeks, so for those reasons I would encourage people to attend.Less

From the TA to the owner, they are there to help you, no matter what.  I love everything about the bootcamp that I did.
Help is right there, you can ask anything, anytime at the chat and someone will answer you, if not rigth away it will be in a matter of seconds.

Taking this software development course has been one of the greatest decisions I’ve ever made. Not only did this program teach me how to approach problems logically, but it has also strengthened my ability to become a better graphic designer and full-stack developer. It's amazing how much you can learn in a short period of time! Then only thing I regret is not taking this course sooner.. But it is never too late :)

Taking this software development course has been one of the greatest decisions I’ve ever made. Not only did this program teach me how to approach problems logically, but it has also strengthened my ability to become a better graphic designer and full-stack developer. It's amazing how much you can learn in a short period of time! Then only thing I regret is not taking this course sooner.. But it is never too late :)

My experience with 4geeks was and continues to be very rewarding. If you are interested in coding, you should consider this bootcamp. The community-like approach is what convinced me. It has been  refreshing to learn in an environment that encourages collaboration and innovation.


The leadership is super friendly and helpful. Plus they have knowledgeable  mentors that will patiently help you out.

The course itself is robust and complete. It moves fast, but it’s doable. You will learn enough about front and back-end to get going. 

You will be surprised of how much you know once you complete the final project.

If you are seriously interested in coding… don’t think about it too much and do it.Less

My overall experience at the boot camp during the cohort and post graduation was great. 
My instructor was phenomenal, he was very patient and great at teaching new technologies. 
The curriculum is fast paced but definitely doable if you keep up with your classes.

My experience with 4Geeks Academy was awesome before I start the BootCamp I'd tried lots of online courses and nothing works, with 4Geeks I've learned the skills to be a programmer and to start a tech career, which is my dream since I have memories.

My experience with 4Geeks Academy was awesome before I start the BootCamp I'd tried lots of online courses and nothing works, with 4Geeks I've learned the skills to be a programmer and to start a tech career, which is my dream since I have memories.

My experience at 4Geeks academy was a very good one, I got to learn so mucho about coding languages and the mentality of a software and developer engineer, the support I received at the academy was excepcional.

I join 4geeks after attending a part time bootcamp at Wyncode - The one thing I loved about 4geeks is the support of the staff - super open , friendly and always always available even after I finish the bootcamp from the founders all the way to the TA. Its a bootcamp so expect to be focus and practice - its not something you do passively but have to be active at it while you are in it! The community is awesome they are always doing events and they are always thinking for tomorrow !

4Geeks is amazing! They allow you to completely change your career in a matter of months. The campus is full of people who can support you, and teachers are always available if you have questions about the work.
The program is very complete, though some thing are challenging you have always the support of the instructors to guide you and a lot of exercises so you can fully learn everything!

I came in during Covid and it's been a life-changer in terms of getting the skills and entering the tech field. I enjoyed the way they helped us and how they were always concerned about providing more and more mentorship and support.

When I first joined 4Geeks, I thought I was only going to be taught what I wanted to learn and maybe be provided with some resources for the future. Was I wrong. They have done much more than that. The culture, education and resources they provide are incomparable. I felt as if I was part of a family. Upon graduating, I felt as if I gained more than what I was expecting to receive. Their level of service and support and desire to help you continue to grow in the industry is something I have never seen before. This organization is top notch.Less

I came across 4Geeks after doing some research on the internet (as one does). There are multiple aspects that differentiated them from other bootcamps. Their curriculum is truly what first got my attention! It was full-stack and involved python. Next, was the price of the Bootcamp. It was important to me that I found a good curriculum that was worth the value that they offered. After meeting with one of the founders, I realized they were the fit for me and immediately applied. They had the best value for the syllabus that I was looking for.
From the beginning, they offered an endless amount of support for any type of question that I had. This was important to me because I am enrolled in the part-time cohort and was not able to see them every day. Their communication is incomparable to other courses I have tried. Outstanding to say the least. Since I have started, I have not been disappointed. I have learned so much in the past 12 weeks (of 16) and am so proud of my progress. I graduate in September and am looking forward to the job support they have promised me. I am confident that they will help me succeed even after I have graduated and moved into my career.Less

4Geeks Academy was an amazing experience, best Coding Bootcamp out there! The syllabus is very complete, the instructors are senior developers and are always there to answer any questions you might have. They also have an amazing career support system. I would 100% recommend this school if you are looking to learn how to code.

It's all about support. They also have many features focused on getting the hard skills, learning complex concepts with Full Mentorship along the way. Every time that I needed some help, I had several instructors ready to help me out.
The experience overall was great, it was more than i was expecting.

Los instructores no se esmeran por la comprensión de los contenidos. El contenido es muy amplio para las sesiones de clases y delegan todo a una plataforma de prácticas. Siempre responden a las preguntas: "lo veremos más tarde". En mi caso la parte de back end fue desarrollada sin práctica, todo el tiempo fue leyendo un código y explicando, diciendo: ya haremos la práctica y al finalizar el contenido dijo: ya finalizamos con  back end

In just 9 intensive weeks, im very fluent in 4 different tech languages with its differents libraries, and its completed my expectations. Nevertheless, I think, when Im finished the course, its probably better for the academy add 1 or 2 more weeks to go deeper on backend. I felt an inequal time between backend and frontend because in 9 weeks, we studied 6 or 7 weeks only front. Flask its too young to see a real return when we have a strongest Django on the other side, and in the vacancies we can see or felt more jobs using PHP or C# than Python. Its so sad change classes to an online system during covid-19's pandemyc, but there's nothing to do.Less

After meeting with two other bootcamps in Miami, the owners of 4 Geeks were the first ones that spoke to me like i was an equal and truly expressed that they wanted to help me. During my cohort, the pandemic happened and they quickly made all the adjustments to have everything move online easily. This is an amazing school with amazing people.

Because of the COVID-19 we did the entire course at home, this was well organized and I'm very satisfied about the acquired knowledge and the support the academy provide.
All the teachers, students and even the ex-students are very helpful.

Puedo decir que fué una agradable experiencia en sus inicios, cuando partimos, pues en ese entonces fué modalidad presencial, pero duró poco la presencialidad devido a la situación covid y tuvimos que continuar remotamente, quedándome la sensación que el precio que pagué era demasiado por la nueva modalidad.
Everyone in 4 Geeks academy is there always for  there’s students, I just have only best words for them. Great experience , Great School.
my experience at 4geeks was very good, I learned a lot in the world of programming the instructors and the facilities were very good

This was a great crash course in web development. The full stack program covers in-depth front end and then lightly touches on APIs and the back-end. For anyone who wants to get started as a junior web developer, this is a good option. Without this course, it would be very difficult to cover this amount of content and be able code effectively on your own.

In my professional experience as a junior studying at 4geeks Academy, I learned to program with Javascript, using it functionally for connection via Html and CSS in addition to creating simple games and apps locally, then I migrated to React to facilitate the use of objects and states, also I adapted to libraries that facilitate code flow like flux, React-Route, DOM handling, Redux (and related packages), Context Api and Rest Api.

I attended 4Geeks Academy Bootcamp (part-time), it was a great experience.  Everything from staff to fellow students made you feel as if you're at home.  Questions are always welcomed and encouraged.  Once you graduate you will continue to have the support the teachers as well as career orientation services.  In my opinion 4Geeks Academy is a great choice if you're looking to start a career as a web developer.

I had a wonderful experience at 4Geeks Academy. I left with exactly what was needed to apply *and get hired for my first dev job. Probably the most useful (and underrated) skill I got from the course was the ability find exactly what I need to expand upon what I learned, and teach myself new skills. Rather than them just giving me a fish and sending me on my way, they gave me a fishing rod and taught me how to catch a fish myself.

I graduated from the part-time full stack program at 4Geeks academy and I had a great experience. I had no coding background and felt that it moved at a fast enough pace to Be able to complete a full project by then end but slow enough that with dedicated time and discipline I was able to keep up. I really like that you have access to a teacher or mentor pretty much 24/7 via slack or office hours to ask questions. After graduating you continue to have that same support which is great. I was able to get tutoring well after I graduated to continue to sharpen my skills and practice.Less

It was a great experience to have gone through 4Geeks Academy, I learned a lot , the support from them was amazing , they were always there for me when i was stuck , even if i didn't asked questions , they were there following up with me and they even get mad when i didn't asked for helped and stayed stuck for more than 20 minutes. Plus they give you like a family environment  in and after the program, if im not wrong they have a life-time support where you can go to their offices and ask Alejandro or anyone who is in there for help. So in conclusion i totally recommend 4Geeks to anyone interested in learning to code.Less
